name: qtree
description: CM table for exporting qtree performance counters

counter_schemas.name: cifs_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of CIFS operations per second to the qtree

counter_schemas.name: css_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of CSS operations per second to the qtree

counter_schemas.name: internal_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of internal operations generated by activites such as snapmirror and backup per second to the qtree

counter_schemas.name: nfs_ops
counter_schemas.description: Number of NFS operations per second to the qtree

counter_schemas.name: parent_constituent_volume.name
counter_schemas.description: Name of the FlexGroup constituent or FlexVol that handled the Ops

counter_schemas.name: total_ops
counter_schemas.description: Summation of NFS ops, CIFS ops, CSS ops and internal ops
